topic.title: Pastebin version for ZeroNet?
topic.body: It would be nice to see a pastebin kind of site in zeronet!

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body:
When I post in url in address bar, instead of going to address it go to search engine??? 
127.0.0.1:43110/145BWAnUn8wzXjE1wH8epjQJfzzYn3dNzz/

1_1HqPpF37myHjtxGUW4nAUPJL1pjQUL9Zyj.body: suicide is not correct, call suicide hotline, they give help for dippression

1_1FaKUqa1nMyNwEpKXvb8o8uvZSpr3jXpNT.body: giftime is very nice! where is gif hosted? in ipfs?

> [ivesen](#comment_3_1NmkVyqBJX6a82YQFYkCNgQpE9AWsmeppp): yes! You can choose to distribute all files, or if you don't it'll only ever download the files you see

Thanks! I'm not very familiar with ipfs, atm I don't have to pay filecoin to access ipfs, right?

1_19Z8aJ32x4pE2iGvVssPJazJgpGe5L32rq.body: True, it isn't hard to create new site, there is handy "clone" button
